title: Car Show Quick Tips - /DRIVE CLEAN
description: Before every car show or weekend drive with my buddies, I spend less than an hour prepping my car before it leaves the garage. Today's episode discusses the idea of creating "contrast" on your vehicle that can help make it look its best. These techniques are designed to emphasize the different colors and textures of your vehicle, inside and out, and get you noticed on the road.
tags: How to detail a car, car show preparation, car cleaning, vehicle exterior care
